section.title: Filter users by organisation unit
section.para: You can view all users that have been assigned to a particular organisation unit.

listitem.para: Open the Users app and click Users.
Above the user list, click on the Organisation Unit filter input.
A popup will appear in which you can select the organisation units you would like to filter by.

section.para: The list of users will be filtered to only include users which have been assigned to the selected organisation units.
